code: import React from'react';import{getLang,setLang}from'../../utils/lang';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EditLanguage(_ref){let{setError}=_ref;const languages=[{name:'Francais',code:'fr'},{name:'Anglais',code:'en'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dL",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"choices",children:languages.map(lang=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`choice ${lang.code===getLang()?'checked':''} `,id:"lang_choice",onClick:e=>{setLang(lang.code,setError);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"example",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`../../assets/${lang.code}.png`,alt:"d"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"name",children:lang.name})]},lang.code);})})});}export default EditLanguage;
